scripts.cyp:component: pnpm cyp:clean &&  hcp vault-secrets run -- cypress open --component
scripts.cyp:component:headless: pnpm cyp:clean && hcp vault-secrets run -- cypress run --component --headless
scripts.cyp:e2e:headless: pnpm cyp:clean && hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm cypress run --e2e
scripts.cyp:e2e:headless:auth: pnpm cyp:clean &&  hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm cypress run --e2e --headless --spec 'cypress/e2e/auth/**/*.cy.ts'
scripts.cyp:e2e:headless:auth:auth: pnpm cyp:clean &&  hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm cypress run --e2e --headless --spec 'cypress/e2e/auth/auth.cy.ts'
scripts.cyp:open: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm cypress open
scripts.cyp:test:e2e: pnpm drizzle:test:generate && pnpm drizzle:test:migrate  && pnpm cyp:e2e:headless
scripts.drizzle:dev:generate: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit generate --config=drizzle-dev.config.ts
scripts.drizzle:dev:migrate: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit migrate --config=drizzle-dev.config.ts
scripts.drizzle:reset:dev_db: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm dlx tsx src/lib/db/seeds/reset.ts
scripts.drizzle:reset:test_db: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm dlx tsx src/lib/db/seeds/reset-test-db.ts
scripts.drizzle:seed:dev_db: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm tsx src/lib/db/seeds/best-seed-dev-db.ts --config=drizzle-dev.config.ts
scripts.drizzle:seed:test_db: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm tsx src/lib/db/seeds/best-seed-test-db.ts --config=drizzle-test.config.ts
scripts.drizzle:test:generate: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit generate --config=drizzle-test.config.ts
scripts.drizzle:test:migrate: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit migrate --config=drizzle-test.config.ts
